synonyms: ataeva—therefore; kṛṣṇa-śabda—the word kṛṣṇa; āge—first; anuvāda—the subject; svayam-bhagavattā—being Himself the Supreme Personality of Godhead; piche—afterwards; vidheya—of the predicate; saṁvāda—the message
translation: "Therefore first the word 'kṛṣṇa' appears as the subject, followed by the predicate, describing Him as the original Personality of Godhead.
